member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_GESTURE_CONFIGURATION
member.summary: Defines the gestures that can be passed to SetManualGesture.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_GESTURE_CONFIGURATION.DIRECTMANIPULATION_GESTURE_DEFAULT
member.summary: Only default gestures are supported. This is the default value.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_GESTURE_CONFIGURATION.DIRECTMANIPULATION_GESTURE_CROSS_SLIDE_VERTICAL
member.summary: Vertical slide and swipe gestures are supported through the cross-slide interaction. For more information, see Guidelines for cross-slide.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_GESTURE_CONFIGURATION.DIRECTMANIPULATION_GESTURE_CROSS_SLIDE_HORIZONTAL
member.summary: Horizontal slide and swipe gestures are supported through the cross-slide interaction. For more information, see Guidelines for cross-slide.

member.name: DIRECTMANIPULATION_GESTURE_CONFIGURATION.DIRECTMANIPULATION_GESTURE_PINCH_ZOOM
member.summary: Pinch and stretch gestures for zooming.
